body:
I tried to add --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/cortexa9hf-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi and failed again, with same error.

make HAS_PKG_CONFIG=false \
	PATH="/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/x86_64-pokysdk-linux/usr/bin/arm-poky-linux-gnueabi/:$PATH" \
	ARCH_FLAGS="-march=armv7-a -mfpu=neon -mfloat-abi=hard -mcpu=cortex-a9 " \
	CFLAGS="-Wno-error  -march=armv7-a -mfpu=neon  -mfloat-abi=hard -mcpu=cortex-a9  -Wconversion -O2 -pipe -g -feliminate-unused-debug-types " \
	CXXFLAGS="-Wno-error -march=armv7-a -mfpu=neon  -mfloat-abi=hard -mcpu=cortex-a9  -Wconversion -O2 -pipe -g -feliminate-unused-debug-types " \
	CPPFLAGS="-Wno-error -march=armv7-a -mfpu=neon  -mfloat-abi=hard -mcpu=cortex-a9  -Wconversion -O2 -pipe -g -feliminate-unused-debug-types " \
	CC="arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-gcc --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/cortexa9hf-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi"\
	CXX="arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-g++ --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/cortexa9hf-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi"\
	RANLIB=arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-ranlib \
	LD=arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-ld \
	LDXX=arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-g++ \
	AR=arm-poky-linux-gnueabi-ar \
	EXTRA_CPPFLAGS=" -Werror=conversion -I/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/cortexa9hf-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi/usr/include -I/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/cortexa9hf-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi/include" \
	GRPC_CROSS_LDOPTS="-L/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/cortexa9hf-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi/usr/lib -L/opt/fsl-imx-x11/4.1.15-2.1.0/sysroots/cortexa9hf-neon-poky-linux-gnueabi/lib " \
	PROTOBUF_CONFIG_OPTS="--host=arm-poky-linux-gnueabi --with-protoc=/usr/local/bin/protoc"  -j32

@nicolasnoble   Hi, Nico, may I have your help? 
 I tried the following issue but stocked by the errors during building the c-ares.
 [`GRPC Cross Compilation [ARM] #9719](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/9719)` 

I checked the build system of the grpc and modified the parameter of make as shown in this issue. I cannot understand why the build system cannot find the include files.

Thank you!
